{"step_by_step_thinking": "Pulpal injury progression leads to inflammation and increased pressure within the pulp chamber. This pressure on the nerve fibers is what causes the pain. Therefore, the main cause of pain during pulpal injury progression is not increased vascular permeability (choice A), decreased threshold of nerve fibres to pain (choice B), or arteriolar dilatation (choice C).
